synopsis: When Gao Mikado opens a card package during writing class he gets a Buddy Rare Card called Drum Bunker Dragon.  Gao and Drum Buddy up and get ready for Future Card battles!

With the help of Baku Omori, a deck builder, and data analyst, Kuguru Uki, Gao gets a deck which he can fight with called "Dragon Blast Fury". At the prestigious fighting stage of Aibo Academy, Gao takes on Tasuku and his Buddy Monster, Jackknife Dragon.

Forced to find a practice partner, Gao picks an unlikely opponent for his next Buddyfight. During the battle, an unexpected Buddy Monster arrives leaving everyone spellbound. Later, Gao upsets Drum and he threatens to reject Gao as his Buddy for good.

Gao’s new friend, Kiri, learns about Buddyfighting, and takes part in an electrifying training session. Drum forgives Gao and helps him out of a tricky situation. The mysterious Buddyfighter Rouga reveals a dark power that may change Buddyfighting forever

Gao wanders off from his class during a fieldtrip and discovers something amazing. Drum learns that he can’t win every battle. Tasuku Ryuenji clashes with the villainous Buddyfighter Wolf, and realizes he needs some top-secret, Buddy Police technology.

Rouga’s thirst for revenge takes him down an unexpected path. Baku puts his faith in Gao, and offers him a special gift. Gao temporarily loses sight of who he really is and takes an obsession too far without considering the consequences of his actions.

The annual Buddyfight tournament is approaching and it has everyone buzzing. Noboru meets an unexpected ally. Tetsuya gets some creative help when he needs it most. And a tense disagreement between Gao and Baku leaves Koguru trying to pick up the pieces.

Shido and Sophia are plotting something bad. Gao’s success in the Buddyfight arena is attracting negative attention from some middle school students. The ABC Cup qualifying round gets underway and there’s a surprising team moving on to the main event.

Gao refuses help from Baku and Kuguru. Gao uses Drum’s keen sense of smell to track down a card thief and then challenges him to a Buddyfight. During the battle, Gao is forced to try something new, which teaches him a valuable lesson about friendship.

While everyone’s at the Aibo Buddy Cup bash, Noboru’s busy at Buddy Police HQ learning about Tasuku’s challenging past. Conflicted about his Buddyfight future, Noboru is faced with a difficult challenge that eventually helps set him on a happier path.

title.jp: The Start of the Aibo Buddy Cup!

synopsis: The ABC Cup finally gets underway, but not before the principals of the elementary and middle schools get into a heated discussion. Gao and his team Balle du Soleil are drawn in the first match against the middle school, but where is their opponent?

title.jp: Power vs. Ninja Arts! A Fierce Competition!

synopsis: Gao’s recruited by the Seifukai. Shido’s up to no good, working secretly behind the scenes to increase his chances of winning the ABC Cup. The second match of the tournament begins, pitting all-out strength against the time-honored art of ninja warfare

The fourth and final match of the ABC Cup’s first round gets underway between Jin and Tetsuya. Meanwhile, Tasuku and Jackknife have an out-of-this-world experience. And Shido is under pressure to find a replacement for Rouga and his powers of darkness.

title.jp: Noble Heart! Together with the Dragon Knight!

synopsis: The final first round match of the ABC Cup begins between Noboru and Shido. And facing a difficult choice, Noboru gets some helpful advice from his Buddy El Quixote. Meanwhile Doai goes looking for Genma and finds more than he bargained for.

title.jp: Dragons Duel! Journey of the Tiger!

synopsis: The gang finds out some upsetting news about Noboru just before his ABC Cup semifinal match against Gao. Angry and confused, Gao gives Noboru a piece of his mind during their heated battle, and we learn how the fighters really feel about each other.

title.jp: Mystique Explosion! The Great Katana World Battle!

synopsis: Zanya and Jin put it all on the line in a Katana World semifinal showdown hoping to advance to the ABC Cup main event. Gao and the gang search for Akatsuki, as he may hold a clue to Genma and Doai’s whereabouts. Sophia reveals a dark truth about herself.

title.jp: ABC Cup Final! Exploring the Underground Maze!

synopsis: The ABC Cup Final gets underway! Gao has a special surprise up his sleeve for his opponent Zanya, but it might just throw the whole tournament out of whack! Meanwhile, the gang goes searching for Genma and finds some assistance from an unlikely source.

Shido tries his best, but as expected, he’s no match for the more powerful Genma. Zanya gets his rematch with Genma and his amazing Buddy, Martial Arts Dragon Emperor Duel Sieger. This battle could go either way. It’s definitely one you won’t want to miss

Gao receives a sentimental gift from his mother, and she agrees to become more involved in his Buddyfighting. Gao and Genma square off for an epic battle in Aibo’s newly renovated fighting stage arena. Who will be crowned the strongest fighter this year?

The showdown for the strongest fighter continues. Genma’s Buddy monster Duel Sieger demonstrates why he’s one of the most feared dragons that’s ever lived. Gao and Genma’s battle extends beyond the fighting stage over something that might surprise you.

Kiri gives the gang a detailed video presentation on the various Buddyfight worlds, highlighting their strengths, powerful monsters and unique spells. Meanwhile, the Buddy Police is in trouble from a higher authority, which seems to be targeting Tasuku.
The gang is invited to a ‘who’s who’ of Buddyfight parties onboard Kyoya Gaen’s luxury yacht.

Drum returns to Dragon World, but doesn’t quite get the homecoming he was hoping for; his father sends him to a parallel world for some special training. Gao heads to Castle where he watches an exciting Buddyfight with a mysterious player called Wind.

Gao and Kazane go head to head in a friendly battle on the Castle stage, and Kazane reveals her secret for why she chose to fight for Dungeon World. Feeling left out and unhappy about his Buddyfight abilities, Kiri finds some help from a shocking source.

To rescue Kiri, Gao and the gang take off for Sengoku Academy, located deep in the mysterious Chohakone mountains. They see a familiar face on the way and soon learn they must obey the strict traditions of the school if they hope to help their friend.

In the quest to find Kiri, the heated showdown between Sengoku and Aibo continues. Genma squares off against a surprising foe who shares a secret with the Seifukai leader. A difference of opinion of what constitutes fair play has the Buddyfighters at odds

Kazane takes on Kemura, and we learn some secrets about the Frog-Man and Legend World. He is still reeling, however, from unwittingly using a Hate Card against Genma in his last match and needs a friendly boost to help him get his head back in the game.

Zanya meets his match when he squares off ninja-style with Kanahebi. A secret from the Kisaragi family’s past comes to the surface, and raises the stakes even higher. Time will tell which Katana World fighter is really living the dream!

Raremaro and Gao headline the fifth match, and let’s just say there’s a little magic in the air! Drum reveals new powers he developed during intensive training in other worlds, and Gao brings Axia off the bench to demonstrate his unusual abilities!

Shosetsu Kirisame finally emerges from the shadows to enter the Buddyfight ring, determined to show Rouga what he’s made of. Gao and Drum set out on a mission for supplies and run into Sophia Sakharov, who seems to be on a mission of her own...

Gao and Drum are MIA, and everyone’s worried they’ll lose their match against Shosetsu by default. Caught up in a new crowd and desperate for strength, Kiri is led down a confusing path. Drum has a major breakthrough at a crucial moment.

Shosetsu falls prey to the Disaster Force, and struggles to claim the strength he seeks. Gao and the gang learn the hard way just how powerful the Dark Core can be, while Tasuku risks his spot on the Buddy Police force in order to protect the game he love

Gao and Rouga square off for Kiri’s freedom, but not without a few fun twists thrown in by Gao for good measure. It’s a neck and neck battle that comes down to the tiniest of margins for the victor. And Tasuku’s fight for justice lands him in big trouble!

The gang watches a video of their triumph over the four demon generals at Sengoku Academy. Kiri challenges Gao to a Buddyfight to test out his new deck. But little do they know the Defenders of Darkness are watching their every move.

Takihara and the Buddy Police face off against a menacing criminal fighter from another world. Some cool new monsters from Hero World arrive on the scene to help, but will Captain Answer come to the rescue?

It’s back to class for Gao and the gang, and it’s the school of hard knocks! Elf Kabala subs in to begin his undercover operation, and Principal Ikarino takes the class on a fieldtrip to a magical fighting stage to teach them some Buddyfighting truths.

Gao and Drum put aside their differences to help Terumi Kuchinawa of the Disaster squad, who is sneaking around Aibo with a sinister plan. But when she runs into Asmodai and Tetsuya, things take an unexpected twist.

The gang gets some new Buddycards, and Gao helps Kiri pick out a Special Rare! Soon after, Kiri receives a life-changing phone call but decides not to share the news with the others. Instead he decides to prove himself with a Buddyfight

Gao receives a letter from Kiri that gives him and the gang quite a chill. They decide to pay Kiri a visit at his new school, but what they find there shocks them to the core! Gao is forced to face off against his old friend and the stakes are high!

Disaster strikes twice for Gao and the gang! Shido and Davide wield the sinister powers of their new decks, built with cards from the mysterious Darkness Dragon World! Until now, this world was just a myth, but now its monsters are coming alive!

Darkness Dragon World continues to mystify the Buddyfighting community, and the Buddy Police are brought up to speed. Gao and Davide have a showcase battle at the Buddy Fest that ends with a roaring finish! Meanwhile, Kiri is still missing…

The Grim Reaper is on the prowl and wreaking havoc! It appears as though no Buddy or Buddyfighter is safe! And with the Buddy Police’s hands tied, Zanya allows the gang to join him on his quest to capture this sinister villain.

Tasuku discovers some troubling news at Buddy Police Headquarters. He enlists Gao’s help to find the Grim Reaper and those responsible for supplying the Dark Core Deck Case. After learning of Disaster’s true intentions, they’ll be changed forever.

Tasuku and Gao fight against the forces of darkness. The ex Buddy Cop surprises his opponents with Jackknife’s awesome abilities, and then is forced to make a difficult choice. With his Buddy on the line, Gao faces off against the Grim Reaper.

Elf Kabala demonstrates his control over some newly acquired Buddy monsters and challenges Gao to a Buddyfight showdown. Tsukikage has an out-of-body experience and surprises everyone when his special bond with Zanya is put to the test.

Kyoya Gaen sponsored, and chose the 8 best teams to Buddyfight in it, the “Gaen Cup” was announced after a meeting. Gao Mikado was invited, but he hesitates to partipate due to being worried about the dangers of Disaster, because of that, his friends gather to fight alongisde him. But, Zanya Kisaragi strictly informs that Tetsuya Kurodake's deck's strength is not enough.”…

The thing that the whole world was expectantly waiting, the curtains of the festival of the century, the “Gaen Cup” finally opens. The Gaen Cup uses the Fighting Stage at Aibou Academy and reconstructed it, the 8 teams, the 24 fighters gathered there. The passionate area’s climax is started with Team Goddess, Amanosuzu Suzuha’s team. Bal Soleil tightens their guard, but how will Kisaragi Zanya fight against a female!?

The first match of the Gaen Cup Semifinals is between Team Destiny’s Noboru Kodo and Team Purgatory’s Purgatory Knight. Purgatory Knight stands with his Buddy, Demios Sword Dragon, Leader of the Purgatory Knights and cruelly fights Noboru. But Zanya manages to see the face of the person inside the armor. Finally, Purgatory Knight reveals his true colors…

Team Destiny’s and Team Purgatory’s next match is between Jin Magatsu and Rouga Aragami. They clash into each other with different feelings for different friends. Meanwhile, the Pugatory Knight Tasuku confronts with Gao, and Tasuku’s natural intention in Disaster shocks Gao.

While the world is heated up by the Gaen Cup, Takihara, Stella and Commander I make their move in order to restore right to the Buddy Police. But they are stopped by Nobari and Sueroku and Magoroku Shido. As they were cornered on the rooftop of Buddy Police HQ by Magoroku with his Disaster Force active, as though all hope was lost, the hero of justice, Captain Answer appears!?

The next match of the Gaen Cup is between Kisaragi Zanya and Aragami Rouga. Zanya was for Tasuku’s sake, Rouga was for Kyoya’s sake, both of them had a lot of things to tell their respective other’s. Their trusted justice clashes in this match. Just what was the things they wanted to convey to their friends? After their friends knew, the moves they made were…

Kyoya Gaen’s plan activates during the final match of the Gaen Cup. A giant monster is seen in Darkness Dragon World’s Gate that appeared in the sky above the Fighting Stage. The crowd became noisy and at that moment, Tasuku and Gao… Finally Kyoya’s ambitions are made clear. What did the Dark Core’s power invite to the world?

The match that decides the world’s fate finally starts. Kyoya uses a special flag, “Dragon Ein”, and reveals Demonic Dragon of Demise, Azi Dahaka’s full form. How will Gao fight against the formidable enemy without seeing it before? And again, while the fight was going on, Tasuku and Kiri enter Kyoya’s hideout, intending to prevent Kyoya’s plot from advancing.
